lexical.title: Length of URL
lexical.description: The number of characters that make up the URL.

lexical.title: Number of labels
lexical.description: The number of sections in a URL separated by full-stop.

lexical.title: Average length of labels
lexical.description: The average length of sections in a URL separated by full-stop.

lexical.title: Number of normal characters
lexical.description: The number of alphabetic characters in a URL.

lexical.title: Number of special characters
lexical.description: The number of symbol characters in a URL.

lexical.title: Number of numerical characters
lexical.description: The number of numerical characters in a URL.

lexical.title: Bag of words
lexical.description: Comparing the most frequently occuring words that appear in a URL.

lexical.title: Character level features
lexical.description: CNN over the characters that make up a URL

lexical.title: Word level features
lexical.description: CNN over the words that make up a URL

lexical.title: Label level features
lexical.description: CNN over the labels that make up a URL

host.title: Server location
host.description: The country the web server is located in.

host.title: Number of servers
host.description: The number of servers reachable behind the URL.

host.title: Registrars
host.description: The company that manages the URL's domain name.

host.title: Creation date
host.description: The date the URL was created.

host.title: Creation date
host.description: The date the URL was created.

host.title: Expiration date
host.description: The date the URL was/will expired.

host.title: Latency
host.description: The time taken for the server to respond.

content.name: Is redirect
content.description: Whether the URL automatically redirects the visitor.

content.name: Type of document
content.description: The type of content being hosted on the URL.

content.name: Length of document
content.description: The length of the document in characters.

content.name: HTML BOW
content.description: Bag of words for malicious HTML tags.

content.name: HTML average word length
content.description: The average length of words in the .html file.

content.name: JS BOW
content.description: Bag of words for malicious JS functions.

content.description: The average length of words in the .js file.
